How it Works
Open a free account and invest in securely stored precious metals at a low, fixed premium. Check your portfolio, place trades, and make deposits and withdrawals 24/7 through our desktop or mobile app. And when you're ready, sell your holdings or convert them into products sold by our partner, JM Bullion. Here's how it works:
Buy Now
Lock in a buy order now at the current spot price.
or
Pre Fund
Fund your CyberMetals cash balance and buy when you're ready.
Browse Products
Lock in a buy order now at the current spot price.
Set Up AutoBuy
Schedule automatic purchases at regular intervals based on a set dollar or ounce amount.
or
Make a Singlepurchase
Make an individual purchase at any time.
Store
Rest assured knowing your investments are securely stored in JM Bullion's fullyinsured vaults in Las Vegas, Nevada.
Sell
Sell your holdings at any time.
or
Redeem
Request quick delivery on a wide range of products through our relationship with JM Bullion, one of the largest precious metals retailers in the world.
Withdraw Funds
Quickly withdraw funds via ACH or bank wire.
Discover a new way to invest in precious metals
Open a free CyberMetals account today and learn how easy and affordable it is to invest in vaulted gold, silver, platinum, and palladium.
